attributes.action: Upgrade the A55 to Motorway status
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The A55 is an important Trunk road and carries a tremendous amount of International Goods traffic. Much of the HGV traffic uses the road at night either to or from the Ferry at Holyhead.
Will the Government please consider upgrading the A55  to the status of a Motorway, for reasons of Safety.  The road needs a Hard Shoulder and Emergency Telephones, and needs to prohibit Slow moving and badly lit vehicles.
